subject:
Rev 486: formatting fix for wider variable names in
	http://samba.org/~tridge/ctdb
body:
------------------------------------------------------------
revno: 486
revision-id: tridge@samba.org-20070606121746-p12g1lia6zrqgipz
parent: tridge@samba.org-20070606115654-7fqbek6uoxforwen
committer: Andrew Tridgell 
branch nick: tridge
timestamp: Wed 2007-06-06 22:17:46 +1000
message:
  formatting fix for wider variable names
modified:
  tools/ctdb_control.c           ctdb_control.c-20070426122705-9ehj1l5lu2gn9kuj-1
=== modified file 'tools/ctdb_control.c'
--- a/tools/ctdb_control.c	2007-06-06 00:29:27 +0000
+++ b/tools/ctdb_control.c	2007-06-06 12:17:46 +0000
@@ -582,7 +582,7 @@
 		return -1;
 	}
 
-	printf("%-17s = %u\n", name, value);
+	printf("%-18s = %u\n", name, value);
 	return 0;
 }
